alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 15 at 10:21AM CDT until June 15 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 AM CDT FOR EAST CENTRAL TENSAS PARISH...SOUTHWESTERN WARREN...CLAIBORNE... SOUTHWESTERN HINDS AND WESTERN COPIAH COUNTIES... At 1019 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Port Gibson, moving southeast at 40 mph. THIS IS A DESTRUCTIVE STORM FOR Claiborne county. HAZARD...Baseball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be severely injured. Expect shattered windows, extensive damage to roofs, siding, and vehicles. This severe storm will be near... Port Gibson around 1025 AM CDT. Pattison around 1035 AM CDT. Hermanville around 1040 AM CDT. Peyton around 1045 AM CDT. Barlow around 1100 AM CDT. Glancy around 1115 AM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...DESTRUCTIVE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
